Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

title: When a heart shatters.
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2Wal7RJ

by lostinhiraeth

‘It’s been 16 years since Phil died, I’m very alone these days…’
Phil felt a small smile tug at his lips.
He hoped it would go that way.

Words: 7777, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Characters: Phil Lester, Dan Howell
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Panic Attack, Depression, Death of a friend, Minor Character Death, Grieving, re-posted without editing so might have errors hit me up if u see any

he admits he’s a little bit obsessed.

-

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: in the last dapg video dan said they were our daddies, then asked "who's the dad" and right after phil interrumpted him- to this...
question: in the last dapg video dan said they were our daddies, then asked "who's the dad" and right after phil interrumpted him- to this day i'm still wondering what's the answer, it won't let me sleep at night
answer: We may never know who our true father is.

reblog.comment: We may never know who our true father is.

trail.content_raw: We may never know who our true father is.
trail.content: We may never know who our true father is.

blog.name: alittledizzy
blog.title: a.little.dizzy
blog.description:
there is a voice inside of you
that whispers all day long
i feel that this is right for me
i know that this is wrong
no teacher preacher parent friend
or wise man can decide
what's right for you - just listen to
the voice that speaks inside
- shel silverstein

Mandy. 30s.
Scifi fan, youtube fan, puppy fan.
RPF heavy blog.

Don't be a dick. :)

summary: things I want to imagine Dan and Phil are doing with their life right now
title: things I want to imagine Dan and Phil are doing with their life right now
body:
- Playing videos games together until 2 am and then telling each other once every five minutes that they probably need to go to sleep and then talking themselves into just one more match, just one more round, just one more level, and only once Phil is basically falling asleep to the point where the control keeps almost dropping from his hands getting up off the sofa and trudging through the bedroom routine of brushing teeth side by side (probably not as long as they should) and taking turns at the toilet and crawling into bed later than they meant to but earlier than they used to, falling fast and deep into sleep. 

- Thoughtfully considering the future while appreciating the present and what this in-between break or hiatus or phase might mean for them. Whether that’s getting down to basics of what their job is (Phil making videos by himself again, what he spent years and years doing) and figuring out what still feels good and what doesn’t, and what amount of himself he wants to put into content. Or getting down to the basics of who they want to be and don’t want to be, aesthetics and influence and social power and all the things that I think keep Dan’s mind busy. I hope Dan watches every video of Phil’s with him while he edits and gives his honest and thorough feedback. I hope Phil sits through every ContraPoints video that Dan wants to watch and listens to Dan’s spiraling inner monologue and maybe Phil cares or maybe he doesn’t but he makes Dan feel listened to and that’s so fucking important. I hope they both have time to listen and be listened to and grow from it.

- Going for runs early in the morning when everything is still a bit cold and dewy and the sun looks pinkish and birds are chirping. Keeping pace with each other because that’s the only way they can quietly shit talk the other runners, rating outfits and making up stories about the people they pass. Stopping to coo at dogs out for their walks before the owners all wander off to their working lives. Stopping on the way back for coffee and Phil talking Dan into ordering pastries too, always always tempting Dan in ways that Dan’s life is better for. Whining about sore legs but being secretly proud that they’re not as sore now as when they started, and both content with their morning routines including this now.

- Laughter. Food. Sex.

- Planning for the future. Paint chips and furniture sets. The television always set to home design shows. Tabs and tabs of IKEA and pinterest. Long carpet vs wood floor debates over dinner. Well meaning relatives calling to weigh in on pieces they’ve recently seen that might look good. Shuffling through the past to see what fits and what does, what memories need to be preserved and what material objects they can allow themselves to grow away from. Setting the stage for a place they’ll call home for many, many years to come.

- Spending entire stretches of days together knowing that each memory they make is for themselves alone. Enjoying that there doesn’t need to be a constant train running in the back of their mind, compartmentalizing some stories away for sharing, weighing the pros and cons, figuring out what details to snip out or smooth paste. Knowing that they can experience a moment and the question of how other people will interpret or co-opt them. I hope these moments feel like theirs and that they’re better for it. I hope they’re embracing the control they have over their life right now.

I hope they’re embracing the control they have over their life right now.
trail.content:
- Playing videos games together until 2 am and then telling each other once every five minutes that they probably need to go to sleep and then talking themselves into just one more match, just one more round, just one more level, and only once Phil is basically falling asleep to the point where the control keeps almost dropping from his hands getting up off the sofa and trudging through the bedroom routine of brushing teeth side by side (probably not as long as they should) and taking turns at the toilet and crawling into bed later than they meant to but earlier than they used to, falling fast and deep into sleep. 

- Thoughtfully considering the future while appreciating the present and what this in-between break or hiatus or phase might mean for them. Whether that’s getting down to basics of what their job is (Phil making videos by himself again, what he spent years and years doing) and figuring out what still feels good and what doesn’t, and what amount of himself he wants to put into content. Or getting down to the basics of who they want to be and don’t want to be, aesthetics and influence and social power and all the things that I think keep Dan’s mind busy. I hope Dan watches every video of Phil’s with him while he edits and gives his honest and thorough feedback. I hope Phil sits through every ContraPoints video that Dan wants to watch and listens to Dan’s spiraling inner monologue and maybe Phil cares or maybe he doesn’t but he makes Dan feel listened to and that’s so fucking important. I hope they both have time to listen and be listened to and grow from it.

- Going for runs early in the morning when everything is still a bit cold and dewy and the sun looks pinkish and birds are chirping. Keeping pace with each other because that’s the only way they can quietly shit talk the other runners, rating outfits and making up stories about the people they pass. Stopping to coo at dogs out for their walks before the owners all wander off to their working lives. Stopping on the way back for coffee and Phil talking Dan into ordering pastries too, always always tempting Dan in ways that Dan’s life is better for. Whining about sore legs but being secretly proud that they’re not as sore now as when they started, and both content with their morning routines including this now.

- Laughter. Food. Sex.

- Planning for the future. Paint chips and furniture sets. The television always set to home design shows. Tabs and tabs of IKEA and pinterest. Long carpet vs wood floor debates over dinner. Well meaning relatives calling to weigh in on pieces they’ve recently seen that might look good. Shuffling through the past to see what fits and what does, what memories need to be preserved and what material objects they can allow themselves to grow away from. Setting the stage for a place they’ll call home for many, many years to come.

- Spending entire stretches of days together knowing that each memory they make is for themselves alone. Enjoying that there doesn’t need to be a constant train running in the back of their mind, compartmentalizing some stories away for sharing, weighing the pros and cons, figuring out what details to snip out or smooth paste. Knowing that they can experience a moment and the question of how other people will interpret or co-opt them. I hope these moments feel like theirs and that they’re better for it. I hope they’re embracing the control they have over their life right now.

title: sweet like cinnamon
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2JotNm2

by peterneds

phil digs in with enough pressure to leave a mark, soothes it with his tongue, and dan’s eyes roll into the back of his skull.

he admits he’s a little bit obsessed.

-

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: (TW) Smoking Masterlist
body:
Comfort Rests Beside Me At Night - phanqueray

Summary: It’s weird how much one event can lead to certain events after it and how it’s so fun to look up the stars and how I stare and fall in love with you.

Firestone - gorgeousdan

Summary: Dan and Phil get high and end up becoming a little bit closer than platonic best friends.

If only I could love you - phantasising

Summary: Dan Howell is one of the most popular kids in school, with a badboy reputation to uphold. On the day that he meets the new boy, Phil Lester, who seems just as bad as himself, he wants to get to know him better…

I Like Your Eyes - ithinkiphan

Summary: Dan is dragged to a party, and the last thing he expects is to meet a mysterious boy, who hates cigarettes but loves books, out on the fire escape.

Let Me Live In A Daydream With You - phanqueray

Summary: In a long bittersweet flashback, Dan relives his memories for the last 8 years. In real life, Phil feels like he’s drowning.

Painted Constellations - botanistlester

Summary: Dan is a painting major at uni who needs someone to paint on for his art project, and Phil is a photography major who needs Dan to model for him.

Purple Lavender Clouds - minniti

Summary: The one where Dan and Phil aren’t bitch ass liars and actually met while Dan was still a student at Manchester uni. if you can cue student stress, shitty studio apartments, and copious weed use–  you’ve got the right picture. 

Rooftop Smokers (wattpad) - SleeplessSophie

Summary: “I’m not either,” Phil replied, looking to Dan with a sly smile. “You still giving out $5 blowjobs?” Well, Dan guessed, he probably did go to his school.

Dan rolled his eyes, “that was a rumor two years ago.”

Phil laughed, “so I brought $5 for nothing?”

Snakebite Heart with a Bubblegum Smile - dark-days-dark-nights-xx

Summary: Phil didn’t want to be there, he really didn’t, but his parents had insisted Uni would benefit and he was determined to hate it. That was until he met his roommate, a guy whose wardrobe consisted of pastel jumpers and flower crowns who made Phil admit who he really was. (Punk/pastel Uni! AU)

Smoke (ao3) - Pinkpuddles

Summary: Phil smokes, Dan doesn’t want him to.

Smoke and Flowers - finnreyofficial

Summary: high school!/teenage! phan au in which Phil tends to the flowers and plants in the greenhouse behind his school and eventually finds himself completely smitten with the boy who sometimes smokes outside his door–Dan Howell.

These Are Words That Go Together Well - mcstarr

Summary: 1960′s Dan and Phil. Dan comes out to Phil and tells him that he has a crush on a friend who isn’t gay.

The Boy with the Rose-Colored Glasses - placingglaciers

Summary: A coming-of-age story where Dan and Phil are caught up in the frenzy of peer pressure, a garage punk band, divorcing parents, and a hint of neighborhood baseball within the fine time of August 1975 in small-town America (if you don’t mind).

The One with the Flower Crown (ao3) - nokomisfics

Summary: Phil likes tattoos and smoking and sneaking into pubs illegally, and Dan likes Phil. Amy’s just around because it’s fun.

The Sun Will Rise, And We Will Try Again - phanlight

Summary: (tw) Phil, the clumsy Barista working an unstable job in a café along the Thames, always carries around too much spare change and really should stop smoking on his lunch breaks. Dan is a struggling street musician making his fortune in pennies on the south bank of London, another stranger in the city, who deserves so much more than the copper thrown at him by passers-by every day. But London is big, loud and really fucking overwhelming at the best of times, and sometimes, city life doesn’t always go to plan. And that’s okay.

You’re Worse Than Nicotine - lionessphil

Summary: Innocent!Phil and bad boy/stoner!Dan meet in detention and end up smoking a joint while getting each other off.

Your Love’s a Fucking Drag (But I Need It So Bad) -  botanistlester

Summary: Dan likes black and leather jackets, Phil likes reading in solitude and playing video games. But they have one thing in common as new roommates at uni: They are both completely straight. Just because they like to get each other off every once in a while doesn’t make it any different.

You Will Be Covered In Gold (fanfiction.net) - Lonewritersclub

Summary: They became famous and loved. But fame is pain sometimes and Dan never was a masochist. Phil can’t help but worry, when their vocalist turns to drugs to find an answer. // Band AU.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Ifdnp never ever were together(which is 99%likely)dont ou think all they did in 09-10was really bad and likenot homophobe...
question: Ifdnp never ever were together(which is 99%likely)dont ou think all they did in 09-10was really bad and likenot homophobe butthey were big dumb, immature and ignorant n stuff?I get that boys always jokes about being gay and things like that but they were next level prankster and its soooo bad(not like they were the only one thought(i saw their "friends"doing the same things(ucanseeonthewaybackmachine) and others being all like "*name*is my boyfriend haha<3")just to joke on their shippers
answer: The short answer is that I don’t think we can fairly judge comments made ten years ago by today’s standards and without context. Since this is a discussion blog, I’ll give you a long answer. First of all, we do need to acknowledge the fact that even if Dan and Phil aren’t and never were dating, we still don’t know their sexualities now or what they considered their sexualities to be at the time. We don’t know if they were joking around, experimenting, or being completely serious, and those things aren’t for us to know. We don’t know about the inside jokes they had with their friends at the time and how those arose. Some of the comments are completely vague and Dan has said in the past that he saw shippers taking a quote he shared, speaking about his ex-girlfriend (people seem to forget or not know that Dan had a girlfriend for a large part of 2009), and passing it around as a phan thing. This really gets to the crux of the problem, which is that those comments weren’t meant for our us. The only reason we see them today, ten years removed, is because people have selected the comments they wanted to save in order to build a narrative, which are but a snapshot, and applied meaning to them, not even necessarily the right meaning. The phandom, particularly when it comes to shipping, seems to think that everything Dan and Phil do or have done is for our consumption and with us in mind, but that’s a fallacy. The majority of the time Dan and Phil are just living their lives and learning and growing and figuring things out like any other person and, if we respect them, we should give them the space to do that without constantly pulling stuff up from the past and judging them for it, in my opinion.
